interpretation:
The Heart on Fire card represents the intense and passionate emotions that come with love and desire. This card symbolizes the burning passion and intensity that can consume us when we are deeply in love or feeling a strong attraction towards someone. It is a reminder to embrace the heat of our emotions and allow them to guide us towards what we truly desire.

When this card appears in a reading, it suggests that the querent is experiencing a strong connection with someone or something. They may be feeling deeply passionate and driven towards a particular goal or person. This card can also indicate a need to be careful with one's emotions, as they can easily become overwhelming and all-consuming.

Overall, the Heart on Fire card represents the powerful and transformative energy of love and desire. It encourages us to embrace our passions and allow them to guide us towards our heart's desires, while also reminding us to be mindful of the intensity of our emotions.
